name: Farming Simulator 23
summary:
From plowing to harvesting to selling your products, Farming Simulator 23 invites players to take control of their own farm to build an agricultural empire! The latest edition of the internationally acclaimed Farming Simulator franchise opens a whole new chapter: More machines from real brands, two maps, new crops and animals, seasonal visual effects and production chains offer seemingly endless open-world gameplay in a familyfriendly environment.

Players choose the kind of farmers they want to be, whether cultivating fields, logging with forestry equipment, or tending to farm animals such as the newly added chicken. Production chains extend the business allowing players to sell products like bread, olive oil or furniture. The improved tutorial mode, AI helper and the new auto-load feature for logs and pallets support the players in their farming career.
